nodes.text: Pevthak-Fra was a Voss commando living on Voss during the Galactic War. Posted at the Koss Overlook in the Gormak Lands, he asked an individual affiliated with the Galactic Republic to kill or capture Gormak leader Jokull.
Pevthak-Fra is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare in 2011. He is voiced by Fred Tatasciore.
